WorkItem.ClosedComment: Compact framework does not support transparency, so multiply layer doesn't 'blend' well ;}
WorkItem.Description:
I have a custom provider that works fine in Winforms. However, on the mobile, only the one map layer is visible. The top layer is a small map and I use Bing as a background to fill in the surrounding area. 

We use the identical code for Winforms and Compact framework.

Is this feature not supported, or is it supported differently on the Mobile?

Thanks you for your fabulous effort :)
WorkItem.Summary: Multiple overlays not working on mobile
